about_the_game:
Legend has it there lies an evil, long forgotten secret in Tynedale. Journey with Geordie as he attempts to achieve what his grandfather could not: conquer complex dungeons, defeat epic bosses and uncover Tynedale’s darkest truth.

  • The Legends of Tynedale is a Zelda-like action-adventure game, inspired by Link's Awakening but with it's own plot twist.
  • Traverse the unlockable world of Tynedale.
  • Explore increasingly challenging, puzzle-box and lock & key dungeons
  • Battle with a wide variety of monsters and epic bosses.
  • Discover mysteries and secrets to collect.
  • Unlock and master powerful weapons and tools.

name: The Legends of Tynedale Demo
short_description: The Legends of Tynedale is a Zelda-like action-adventure game based in a dense, expanding world. Explore complex dungeons, fight clever and challenging monsters, solve curious puzzles, and discover hidden secrets. Journey with Geordie as he takes on his Grandfather’s legacy.
